Isabella Rodriguez.description: hosting the poetry party, facilitating discussions and enjoying the performances (engaging with guests and asking about their sonnets) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:piano

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria and Klaus discussing their gaming experiences and making plans to play a post-apocalyptic game together, as well as reminding each other about a poetry party and bringing a Shakespearian sonnet. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, how's the gaming going? Find any new exciting games to play?
Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! Gaming has been going well, I actually found this new game that I've been really into lately.
Klaus Mueller
That's awesome! What's the game about?
Maria Lopez
It's a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The graphics are amazing!
Klaus Mueller
That sounds really interesting! I've always been intrigued by post-apocalyptic themes. Do you mind if I join you sometime to check it out?
Maria Lopez
Of course, Klaus! I would love to have you join me. How about we plan to meet up tomorrow after class at the campus coffee shop and we can play together?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great, Maria! I look forward to checking out the game with you tomorrow. Thanks for inviting me!
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll message you the details later. By the way, don't forget about the poetry party tonight. You still need to bring a Shakespearian sonnet!
Klaus Mueller
Thanks for the reminder, Maria! I'll make sure to bring my Shakespearian sonnet tonight. Looking forward to gaming with you tomorrow!
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll see you at the poetry party tonight then. Don't be late!
Klaus Mueller
Looking forward to it, Maria! See you at the poetry party tonight!
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll see you at the poetry party tonight then. Don't be late!
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, Maria! Looking forward to catching up with you at the poetry party tonight. See you there!
Maria Lopez
See you tonight at the poetry party! Have fun tonight and don't forget your sonnet!
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, Maria! I'll make sure to bring my Shakespearian sonnet tonight. Looking forward to seeing you at the poetry party!
Maria Lopez
Have a great rest of your day, Klaus! See you at the poetry party later.
